General.Name: Ser Educacional Sa
General.Description: Ser Educacional S.A. primarily engages in the development and administration of activities in the areas of teaching, on-site and digital undergraduate, graduate, professional education, and other associated areas in Brazil. The company manages 62 campuses, including two universities, 21 administrative centers, and 31 colleges, as well as 948 digital teaching centers. It operates under various brands. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Recife, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Treze de Maio, Recife, PE, Brazil, 50100-160
